title: 510 - Jailed and Pregnant: What the Roe Repeal Means for the Incarcerated
itunes:title: 510 - Jailed and Pregnant: What the Roe Repeal Means for the Incarcerated
description: Dr. Carolyn Sufrin joins the podcast to talk with Dr. Sharfstein about the implication of overturning Roe vs Wade for a special population—people who are incarcerated. Dr. Sufrin is an obstetrician/gynecologist and a researcher on reproductive health at Johns Hopkins.
